mapper.insert: INSERT INTO escape.wk_recievelcu_produced_esc(esc_date, center_id, column01, column02, column03, column04, column05, column06, column07, column08, column09, column10, column11, column12, column13, column14, column15, column16, column17, column18, column19, column20, column21, column22, column23, column24, column25, column26, column27, column28, column29, column30, column31, column32, column33, column34, column35, column36, column37, column38, column39, column40, column41, column42, column43, column44, column45, column46, column47, f_del, ins_date, ins_time, ins_user_id, ins_func_id, ins_ope_id, upd_date, upd_time, upd_user_id, upd_func_id, upd_ope_id) select now(), center_id, column01, column02, column03, column04, column05, column06, column07, column08, column09, column10, column11, column12, column13, column14, column15, column16, column17, column18, column19, column20, column21, column22, column23, column24, column25, column26, column27, column28, column29, column30, column31, column32, column33, column34, column35, column36, column37, column38, column39, column40, column41, column42, column43, column44, column45, column46, column47, f_del, ins_date, ins_time, ins_user_id, ins_func_id, ins_ope_id, upd_date, upd_time, upd_user_id, upd_func_id, upd_ope_id from centralkitchen.wk_recievelcu_produced where center_id = #{centerId};
